titleStmt.title: Eshcol, or Grapes (among) thorns. As they were delivered in a Thanksgiving sermon, to the Honourable House of Commons. By John Bond, Mr. of the Savoy.
titleStmt.author: Bond, John, 1612-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.F. for Samuell Gellibrand, at the Brazen Serpent in St. Pauls Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A thanksgiving sermon before the Honourable House of Commons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Brazen Serpent in St. Pauls Church-Yard
